publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-587# Mr John McAllion: Fuel Poverty and Housing Bill—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to include specific measures for the eradication of fuel poverty within a specific timescale in the forthcoming Housing Bill.
